question:
You are going to another country to study. You would like to do a part-time job while you are studying, so you want to ask a friend who lives there for some help. 


Write a letter to this friend. In your letter


Give details of your study plans


Explain why you want to get a part-time job


Suggest how your friend could help you find a job
text: As I discussed with you earlier , I am planning to attend my Master degree  at Singapore National University .  I might  choose to attend Data Science subject which has good opportunities and trends in next few years . This course will take approximately two years to finish and I need to submit my research proposal within this time frame . I will also apply for  a  study grant and I hope all things could be completed successfully as per my plan .

Singapore is one of the most expensive cities in the world and I will need to work a part-time job to cover some of my personal expenses and to get some experience. Obviously , I understand it would be difficult to get well-paid jobs for students during this pandemic time .
As I  know  , you have a rich network in Singapore and you could introduce me to any one of them. If possible I would prefer to work in Data Science related areas like Data Collector or Data Entry .
I hope you could help me and support  my request .
I am looking forward to hearing from you .
